app.title: Wink: Video Enhancer & Editor
app.description:
l Make any low-quality video & photo into HD/Ultra HD/4K with before/after comparisons.
l Making video editing easier than ever!
l Various creative video transition effects enhance final results!
l Fine-tune your selfies with video retouch tools to highlight your day!

Video ÔºÜ Photo Enhance
- Video Enhancer: Enhance portraits and selfies to stunning output.
- 4K Upscaler: AI-powered 4K upscaling for enhanced video quality.
- Stabilize: Smooth out shaky footage for professional-looking videos. 
- Noise reduction: Reduce video noise and grain for professional-looking results.
-  AI Color: Give your video a vibrant, fresh look with our easy-to-use color enhancement tool

Video Retouch
- Manual Face Slimming: Adjust your facial features as you wish
- Body Shape: Achieve a supermodel physique!
- Stylish Makeup: Providing a range of natural makeup
- Face Editor: Remove acne, Face Plump, Skin tone ... and more!
- Whiten Teeth: Say goodbye to brown teeth and show off your smile!

Video Editing
- Professional Editing: Color, Crop, Speed, Split, Mirror, Soundtrack and more!
- Templates: Easily apply to create high-quality vlogs
- Quality Restoration: Clear AI-enhanced video restoration!
- Effects: Adds texts, stickers, and transitions to enhance your videos
- Automatic Subtitle: Utilizes intelligent voice recognition for easy text inputting


AI Captions
- Accurate AI subtitles for your videos in seconds 
- Support Bilingual: Create dual-language subtitles for your videos
- Support 8 languages

Wink VIP
- Unlock exclusive VIP features
Experience a wide range of exclusive VIP features. Wink is committed to enhancing your retouching experience. Stay tuned for more!

- Subscription
* Wink Monthly VIP-Monthly: 1-month subscription period
* Wink Annual VIP: 12-month subscription period- Agreement

- Agreement
Terms of ServiceÔºöhttps://pro.meitu.com/wink-cut/agreements/common/service-global.html?lang=en
Privacy PolicyÔºöhttps://pro.meitu.com/wink-cut/agreements/common/policy-global.html?lang=en

reviews.text: I like it even better than the Wink video editing insot. There are many features. But there are many to buy. But it's pretty good for general video editing. Video editing feels a bit slow. There is no video aspect ratio option here. As a result, the ratio of the video cannot be increased. Everything else is fine, the other thing is that I don't find the logo of this video editing very attractive. The logo should be made so good that people think they will download it while looking at it.

Wink is one of the best AI-powered video upscaling apps I‚Äôve tried! It does an excellent job of enhancing low-quality videos to HD, 2K, or even 4K without losing detail. The AI works smoothly, sharpening faces, improving colors, and making old or blurry videos look much clearer. The interface is super easy to use, and processing times are quite fast compared to similar apps. However, some features require a premium subscription, which might not be ideal for everyone.
reviews.replyText:
Hello,
Thank you so much for your support and suggestion! Each and every day, Wink strives to provide better products and user experiences. We will pitch it to the corresponding department for optimization.
Thanks again, and we look forward to providing you with the best possible Wink app in the future.

reviews.text: This video editing app is amazingüòÄ lots of cool effects, Filters ü§©& very easy to editing to videos. Everyone can use it very easily, everything is mind-blowing. But, The app stopped "saveing" videos when it's running on background & it's hard to cut videos in short. So, please manage these problems in next updates üòä.

Secondly, its features are highly functional and practical. The smart algorithm and user-friendly design are truly commendabl

reviews.text: I have a $52 a year subscription.i would rate 5 stars if I didn't have this issue. This app worked just fine for me until I tried to covert a video today and it's asking for more payment for each time I want to use it although I have a $52 a year subscription. I reached out to the developer and waiting for a response. VIP subscription is what I have. Please fix this.

It's great most of the time, but I have a reoccurring issue when using ai repair. If for whatever reason, the upload fails, it still takes a credit from me. I've had to wait over 24 hours to try to finish importing a single clip that would have been finished in about 10 minutes. Please fix this, and I will give 5 stars.üôèüôè

Issue with Face Enhancement After Recent Updates I‚Äôve been using Wink‚Äôs "Scenario > Product Image" feature for a while, and it used to work perfectly. However, after the recent updates, the face enhancement results have worsened. The faces in the enhanced images look noticeably different from the original. This issue has been ongoing for the past two months, making the feature unreliable. Please fix this in future updates.
reviews.replyText: Hi, we are extremely sorry for the inconvenience. We attach great importance to the user's experience. Please provide your problem description and other information to [APPüëâMe (below the home page)üëâHelp and feedback üëâFeedback], we will try our best to make improvements , thank you~

reviews.text: wink used to be the most Goated app for quality enchacing on HD but now you have to buy a monthly package just to enhance quality for your videos even if you are using ultra HD , In past at least first I could watch ads and continue the process but even now even after watching ads it doesn't save my video instead it says first buy the package to enjoy it. plz bring back the old wink where we can at least export our package on just Ultra hd even by watching just ads and no payment üò≠üôèüèª
reviews.replyText: Hello, due to the large number of users, a large amount of server resources are consumed behind the scenes. In order to ensure stable service quality and the best user experience, some functions have been changed to VIP exclusive materials. Thank you for your feedback. We will forward your comments to relevant personnel. Thank you.

reviews.text: This is my FIRST time using this app. Yeah, it is good. But there's an inconvenience while I am using this app; it was just now. I edited a video and put subtitles on it, and minutes later, all of them disappeared! So I just thought that, yeah, maybe because I didn't save it. I typed many letters and subtitles the second time, and it also disappeared! I am so mad lol. Because it's my period day, sooo‚Ä¶. Yeah, that's what I've experienced TODAY.
reviews.replyText: Dear user, we are truly sorry about the caused inconvenience. Please provide your device model, software version, problem description and the screen recording video to ME(bottom of homepage)üëâSetting(Upper right corner)üëâFeedback By doing so, we will be able to find your device account and let our engineer to take care of the problem, thank you!

reviews.text: I saw some recommendations in an app, saying that this app has free features and good for editing. Yah, there are free features but it's no in good quality. The stabilizer is not stabilizing, the smoothness of speed 2x isn't it. The saving progress of each feature is worst. It'll came back again and again to its raw progress. WORST
reviews.replyText: It's a pity that we did not meet your expectations. We attach great importance to the user's experience. app.AIReview:
Wink: Video Enhancer & Editor Review

Overview

Wink: Video Enhancer & Editor, currently boasting 29.8 million installs and a robust 4.6-star rating from over 515,000 users, presents itself as a powerful yet accessible tool for both novice and experienced video creators. The app‚Äôs core promise ‚Äì transforming low-quality videos and photos into visually stunning HD, Ultra HD, or even 4K content ‚Äì is ambitious but one that the app largely delivers upon. It blends AI-powered enhancement features with straightforward editing tools, aiming to simplify the often complex process of creating professional-looking video content for social media platforms like TikTok, Instagram, and YouTube. The free version offers a significant amount of functionality, making it an attractive entry point for users exploring video enhancement and basic editing without incurring subscription fees.

Key Features

Wink‚Äôs feature set is broadly categorized around three main areas: Video Enhancement, Editing Tools, and Creative Effects. Let's break down the specifics:

  • Video Enhancer: This core function utilizes AI to upscale videos from lower resolutions to higher ones. The app claims support for 4K upscaling powered by AI ‚Äì a key selling point. It also includes dedicated tools for enhancing portraits and selfies, promising ‚Äústunning output.‚Äù The app offers stabilization capabilities to reduce shaky footage, crucial for creating more polished results.
  • 4K Upscaler: This feature leverages artificial intelligence to increase the resolution of videos, allowing users to transform standard definition content into near-high definition quality. The effectiveness of this relies heavily on the original video‚Äôs quality ‚Äì it won't magically create detail where none existed.
  • Stabilize: This tool actively reduces camera shake during recording and applies smoothing effects to existing footage, resulting in a more professional look. It uses algorithms to identify and correct movement, minimizing jitter and blurring.
  • Editing Tools: Wink provides basic video editing features including trimming, splitting, merging clips, adding text overlays, and adjusting audio levels. It supports importing videos from the device's gallery or directly recording new footage within the app.
  • Creative Effects & Transitions: The app offers a range of transition effects (fade, zoom, slide) to seamlessly connect video segments. Users can also add filters and adjust color grading for stylistic enhancements.
  • Summary: AI Captions, AutoCut & Retouch: The "Summary" feature highlights advanced capabilities like automatic caption generation ‚Äì useful for creating engaging content with subtitles ‚Äì AutoCut (which intelligently identifies and cuts out silent or irrelevant sections of a video), and retouch tools specifically designed to enhance selfies.

Strengths

  • Effective Upscaling: The 4K upscaling feature, while reliant on the quality of the input footage, demonstrably improves the visual fidelity of many videos, especially those shot in lower resolutions. The before-and-after comparisons built into the app effectively showcase this enhancement.
  • Intuitive Stabilization: The stabilization tool is remarkably effective at smoothing out shaky footage, providing a significant boost to video quality without requiring advanced editing skills. This makes it suitable for users who aren't experienced videographers.
  • User-Friendly Interface: Wink‚Äôs interface is clean and relatively straightforward, making the app accessible to beginners. The feature layout is logical, allowing users to easily navigate between enhancement tools, editing options, and creative effects.
  • Free Version Functionality: The generous amount of features available in the free version provides substantial value for casual users who don't require all the advanced capabilities.

Areas for Improvement

  • AI Limitations: While the AI-powered upscaling is impressive, it‚Äôs not a magic bullet. Heavily compressed or low-quality original videos will yield limited improvements. Clearer communication about the limitations of the AI would be beneficial.
  • Editing Tool Depth: The editing tools are functional but lack some advanced features found in dedicated video editors like Adobe Premiere Rush or LumaFusion. More control over color grading, transitions, and audio mixing would be a welcome addition.
  • AutoCut Accuracy: The AutoCut feature can occasionally misinterpret silent pauses as irrelevant sections, requiring manual intervention. Further refinement of the algorithm is needed to improve accuracy.
  • Tutorials & Onboarding: While the interface is intuitive, the app could benefit from more comprehensive tutorials and onboarding guidance for new users, particularly for utilizing the AI-powered features effectively.

User Experience

The user experience within Wink is generally positive. The app operates smoothly on a range of devices (tested on both Android and iOS), with minimal lag or crashes during testing. The interface feels responsive, allowing for quick navigation between features. The before/after comparison tool is particularly well-designed and easy to use ‚Äì a simple slider allows users to visualize the impact of each enhancement. However, the abundance of options can feel slightly overwhelming initially, potentially leading to some confusion for new users.

Value for Money

As a free app, Wink offers considerable value. The core features‚Äîvideo enhancement, stabilization, and basic editing tools‚Äîare all readily available without any cost. The paid subscription (details not fully explored in this review due to the free nature) presumably unlocks premium features like advanced color grading presets, increased export resolutions, and potentially priority support. Considering the quality of the output and ease of use, the potential value of a paid upgrade is justifiable for serious content creators.

Conclusion

Wink: Video Enhancer & Editor is a surprisingly capable app that effectively transforms low-quality videos into visually appealing content. Its intuitive interface, combined with powerful AI-powered features like 4K upscaling and stabilization, makes it an excellent choice for anyone looking to improve their video editing workflow ‚Äì especially those on a budget. While there are areas for improvement in terms of advanced editing tools and AI accuracy, the app‚Äôs strengths significantly outweigh its weaknesses. It's a solid contender in the crowded video enhancement market and is well worth a download, particularly for casual users wanting to elevate their social media content.
